section:
A storm gathers, plunging the day into gloom. A howling wind descends upon you, and the heavens open in a deluge of rain. Thunder and lightning shatter the sky .You cannot see more than a few feet in front of you, and there is nowhere to take shelter. Amid the fury of the storm you fancy to hear voices, calling. Or is it the wind?
Follow the voices Huddle down and sit out the storm
